document_data.image: Mysteries of the Moonsea - Captain Serag Kull - William O'Connor - p52.jpg
document_data.caption: Captain Serag Kull.
document_data.name: Serag Kull
document_data.mainbody: '''Serag Kull''' was one of the captains of the military force known as the [[Red Plumes]].
document_data.Description: Serag stood around 6 ft (1.8 m) tall with a broad build. He had a scar on his neck that he received from a [[Zhentarim]] soldier.
document_data.Personality: Never to be out-manipulated, Kull was a cruel, sly and dangerously smart individual.
